method.name: POST
method.doc: To do this with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the Reverse Proxy Migrate resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: file
param.doc: The .zip file that contains the migrated configuration bundle. Note: the file parameter is required. The .zip file should have been created by running the wga_migrate.pl script on an existing instance.

param.name: overwrite
param.doc: Overwrite existing files with imported files of the same name.

response.doc: 200 ok Note: For the changes to take effect, they must be deployed as described in Configuration changes commit process.
There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
